      • getScriptByLocale

        public static java.lang.String getScriptByLocale(IlibLocale target)
        Seeks for full locale name in locales map and returns script of target locale, otherwise - default script Latn
        Parameters:
        target - locale in BCP 47 format
        Returns:
        native script for given locale and default script Latn if locale is not detected
